PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-07982021-08-04JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE L. BERNETTE HO, a Justice of the Court of Queen’s Bench of Alberta, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta; and to be a Judge of the Court of Appeal for the Northwest Territories and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Nunavut during her tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of the HONOURABLE L. BERNETTE HO, a Justice of the Court of Queen’s Bench of Alberta, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta; and to be a Judge of the Court of Appeal for the Northwest Territories and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Nunavut during her tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta.
